details.value: 4 Months (12-18 weeks) Full Time (1 Work Term)
UVic Bio Innovation Hub, 3542 Blanshard St, Unit 206, Victoria BC

details.key: Are remote work arrangements possible for this co-op role?:
Does this job require the student to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19?:

details.value:
First Pass Innovation is a start up and is bringing an app to market: Code Blue Leader.

We are looking for individuals who can potentially cover a few roles which include Customer and GoLive Support, Business and Applications Analyst:

Customer Support and Go Live Support - coordinate customer pilots/roll outs, collect and triage customer support issues, liaise with engineering to support issue resolution

Business and Applications analyst - develop application documentation, test scripts, investigate use of AI to improve code blue algorithm development

For more information on this company, please visit: https://www.firstpassinnovation.com/
Self starter, experience with application development processes, demonstrated teamwork, exposure to lifesaving algorithms such as ACLS, ITLS, PALS, BLS.
